ModMetaData.name: [GMT] Mausoleums, Tombs and Graves
ModMetaData.author: Grizzlemethis
ModMetaData.description: About Adds mausoleums, tombs and graves into the game where pawns and animals can be buried. Colonists can then visit these to gain meditative joy. Dependencies This mod uses Harmony and Mass Graves Compatibility This is safe to add to existing saves but if you want to remove the mod then remove all structures from this mod and save your game. Once you have done that the mod can be removed. This mod patches the offset for nearby graves so that these structures are included. Texture by GHOST
